column5: Got out today with DMASSE and BOWSHEP,... -8 when we got there at 8:00 am but warmed up to 0 by noon, actually got a sunburn for the first time this year...lol......Dmasse was hittin em all day, I got my PB for a buck and a hen.....  ,... and shep lost a couple,...all in all was a great outing,...the fish in the pics measured 29" x 17" for Me and 31" x 16" for Dave,...no pics of my Hen as they cam batts died but she measured 29"x16",..also saw a couple OFC members in CCMT and BLY,...look for their post later....  Heres 3 pics of my male....         And Daves Big Fish of the day....     Ken Helping Dave beach this piggy....
Congrat on the PB, man it looks like fun...
Very Nice! I tried my new fly rod at Erindale park today but got nothing. I was only there for a bit on my lunch break
Nice fish!      Good to see some blue water.
Nice fish guys congrats on your PB  Rob
wow....does that ever look nice...great lookin fish..congrats and thanks for sharing that!!
MIKE AND KEN  Thanks for the great day,  It was fun and lets do it again soon  By the way that fish Mike looks huge,  Way to go,  now we need KEN to start catching more fish than us. LOL  Dave
Cool...blue snow.  haha Nice fish...congrats on your PB.
Had a great time today... and you should know Dave l dont give up... l can be beaten like a dog  lol  Ken
That first photo looks great!, good going guys.
nice job guys...looks like you attacked the same grounds I did on Friday and Saturday....hopefully we get  another good run with the rain coming at the end of the week.

Last year l noticed that it was always difficult to get all the colours around the rainbows Head. On the side shots because of the way the light reflects off the fish.. but making the Rainbows head be the focal point you are able to get all of the colours. Yes Mikes fish looks bigger than Daves but l did nottake that pic... Daves fish looked just as good as Mikes and was even bigger...  Ken
